ABOUT ME

Hi friends. This is me Hema Priya Dharshini. I am an engineering student pursuing third year(undergraduate) in computer science in Mepco Schlenk Engineering College, Sivakasi.

I am the one who is interested in learning new skills that seems interesting and needy to me.

My hobbies are drawing, dancing and reading novels.
